data.description: Updated two-story traditional home right in the heart of the action! HGTV Designer and Atlanta local, Brian Patrick Flynn, helped to renovate a few of its rooms, and the home was featured as the 2013 HGTV Holiday Home. This gorgeous home is situated in a quiet neighborhood with sidewalks and mature trees. The welcoming front porch leads to a spacious foyer. Updated and modern features are found throughout. Hardwood floors on the main level. The separate dining room features crown molding, wainscoting, and a transom window entry. The family room provides great wow factor with its soaring ceilings and ample natural light. Your eye is immediately drawn to the beautiful fireplace with stone tiles and concrete mantel. The kitchen is another show stopper, featuring dark blue cabinets, marble counters, basketweave tile accent walls, and stainless steel appliances. It also has a custom poured concrete island and separate bar counter, offering tons of counter space and storage space. At the top of the stairs, you’ll find a lovely balcony overlooking the tree-lined street. The oversized primary suite boasts tray ceilings, dual vanities, separate whirlpool tub and step-in tile shower, plus a walk-in closet complete with custom built-ins. Another bedroom shares a jack-and-jill bathroom with the office, which has its own glass balcony overlooking the family room. The fenced backyard is a welcome retreat. A pergola offers shade to the roomy deck, great for entertaining. A stone path leads to a cozy firepit. Simply install a hot tub on the lower deck to complete your backyard oasis! Decatur is known for its vibrant community and close proximity to all of Atlanta’s hot spots. Decatur has a great Farmers Market, and offers lots of restaurants, shopping, and coffee shops. Nearby Avondale and Oakhurst offer greenspace, restaurants, and local breweries. The home is also located within minutes of the interstate and numerous local parks and trails.
